nodes.text: Aakars was a male General who served the Galactic Republic during the Cold War. He was stationed at the Gorinth Canyon on Balmorra around 3643 BBY, when he was killed.

Aakars appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as a champion boss on Balmorra. He is not directly involved in any quests, but can be killed for loot and as part of the achievement. This article assumes 100% game completion, which means he was killed.
